full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYIN RLABS MCHOG STZOL MA'I 'GREL PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(ZHES MANG DU THOS PA BKA' 'GYUR BA RGYAL MTSAN DGE SLONG BSKUL BA'I 'DOD GSOL SMON LAM DANG BCAS PA 'DI LA 'GREL PA BYED DGOS TSUL SA SKYONG MA'I DBANG PO DON GRUB RDO RJE CHING WANG GIS BSKUL BA LTAR BKA' 'GYUR BA NO MONG HAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DBANG RGYAL MCHOG GI BKAS AER TE NI DBU MDZAD CES 'BOD CING, MING GZHAN PI LEG THU DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN NO, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
